00015 unsigned short CTFrame::getCtID() const{
00016     MACAddress mac = getDest();
00017     short CtID = 0;
00018     CtID=(mac.getAddressByte(4)<<8);
00019     CtID=CtID|mac.getAddressByte(5);
00020     return CtID;
00021 }
00022 
00023 void CTFrame::setCtID(unsigned short ctID){
00024     MACAddress mac = getDest();
00025     mac.setAddressByte(4, ctID>>8);
00026     mac.setAddressByte(5, ctID);
00027     setDest(mac);
00028 }
00029 
00030 unsigned int CTFrame::getCtMarker() const{
00031     MACAddress mac = getDest();
00032     int CtMarker = 0;
00033     CtMarker=(mac.getAddressByte(0)<<24);
00034     CtMarker=CtMarker|(mac.getAddressByte(1)<<16);
00035     CtMarker=CtMarker|(mac.getAddressByte(2)<<8);
00036     CtMarker=CtMarker|mac.getAddressByte(3);
00037     return CtMarker;
00038 }
00039 
00040 void CTFrame::setCtMarker(unsigned int ctMarker){
00041     MACAddress mac = getDest();
00042     mac.setAddressByte(0, ctMarker>>24);
00043     mac.setAddressByte(1, ctMarker>>16);
00044     mac.setAddressByte(2, ctMarker>>8);
00045     mac.setAddressByte(3, ctMarker);
00046     setDest(mac);
00047 }
